title: Dokotoo Womens Dresses 2025 Spring 3/4 Sleeve Fashion Dresses Crewneck Casual Mini Dress with Pockets S-XL
description: Soft Material: This womens dresses is made of soft, stretchy and lightweight material. It is lightweight and can be easily dress up or dress down.
Unique Features: Women short dresses features in Crew neck ,3/4 sleeves, basic style, spring summer casual dresses with two side pockets to carry little things when you go outside.
Occasion: This cute dress is perfect for leisure, work, home, office, party, vacation, picnic, shopping, travel, school, daily. Good for spring, summer and fall wear.

Easy Match: You can pair jacket with it,a different beautiful look will occur. With its basic solid color and elegant simplicity, it never goes out of style. Basic dress could also pair well with plain or luxury accesories as a highlight of your outfit.
Washing instruction:Machine washable, wash in cold water, hang or line dry and do not bleach. Please refer to the size chart before ordering. Any other questions, please tell us freely.
